com.xhive
Class XhiveDriverFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.xhive.XhiveDriverFactory

public class XhiveDriverFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Use the driverFactory class to get a XhiveDriver implementation.

(c) X-Hive Corporation B.V. (www.x-hive.com)

Since:
X-Hive/DB 1.0

Method Detail

getXhiveVersion

public static java.lang.String getXhiveVersion()
Return the X-Hive/DB version as a String. Does not indicate whether this is an evaluation copy or not.

Returns:
The version as a string, e.g. 'X-Hive/DB 4.0'.
Since:
X-Hive/DB 4.0

getBootstrapFileName

public static java.lang.String getBootstrapFileName()
Determines the bootstrap filename, which is either specified by:
  • The value of the xhive.bootstrap system property.
  • The value of the first line of the xhive.bootstrap file in the user directory.

Since:
X-Hive/DB 4.0

getDriver

public static XhiveDriverIf getDriver()
Get a XhiveDriverIf Implementation.

Since:
X-Hive/DB 1.0

getDriver

public static XhiveDriverIf getDriver(java.lang.String bootstrapFileName)
Get a XhiveDriverIf Implementation, and specify the bootstrapfile to use. If xhive.properties is specified then this is used to initialize the properties (this can be done only once!).

Parameters:
bootstrapFileName - The bootstrap file to use. This may be a path to xhive.properties or XhiveDatabase.bootstrap.
Throws:
XhiveException.FEDERATION_NOT_FOUND - if the bootstrapfilename is invalid
XhiveException.BOOTSTRAP_FILE_ERROR - if the bootstrap file is incorrect
Since:
X-Hive/DB 2.0

getFederationFactory

public static XhiveFederationFactoryIf getFederationFactory()
Get a factory that can create X-Hive/DB federations.

Since:
X-Hive/DB 5.0
